channel.title: [562] How Do I Make My Self Owner? [562]
channel.description: Yea i downloaded a 562 server and it works but i cannot find where i make myself owner at in the source flder any help? Thank You.

item.title: [562] How Do I Make My Self Owner? [562]
item.dc:creator: @iloob iloob
item.description:
@iloob wrote:

go to yourservername -> data - savedgames: and open up your characters file and search right and change it to either 2 for admin or 1 for mod.
For the owner part, go to yourservername -> src -> com -> rs2hd -> packethandler: open up CommandPacketHandler.java not CommandsPacketHandler.java and search for something like if (player.getUsername().equals("
and change to your username.

Read full topic
item.source: [562] How Do I Make My Self Owner? [562]
